settings.heading: The Powerful Ingredients, Proven To Relieve Everyday Aches and Pain

settings.title: Can PEA help relief lower back discomfort?
settings.text:
Lower back pain is the number one reason why people miss work or canâ€™t do the activities they enjoy. In fact, according to the World Health Organization (WHO), lower back pain is the most common cause of disability worldwide.

Sciatic pain involves inflammation and pressure on the main nerve that runs from the lower back through the legs, and sciatic nerve issues are perhaps the most common cause of lower-back pain. PEA has been clinically shown to provide relief. In a gold-standard placebo controlled study involving 636 people suffering from sciatic nerve pain, study participants taking 600 mg of PEA daily reported both pain reduction and quality-of-life scores that were significantly better among those in the placebo group.

settings.title: What is the difference between Turmeric and Curcumin?
settings.text: Curcumin is found in the root of the turmeric plant and the curcuminoids derived from curcumin are the active ingredient of the turmeric extract contained in Durable Body.

settings.title: How can inflammation be both so helpful and so harmful?
settings.text:
Acute inflammation is a natural part of your bodyâ€™s defense system. When your body is injured or damaged due to a bruised shin or a strained muscle, it sends a signal out for help â€“ like an emergency siren to send in natural first aid.

Your body sends this signal by releasing various chemicals to encourage fluid to surround and isolate the damaged area. This fluid can cause temporary visible swelling and redness which is part of the protection and healing process.

Acute inflammation only lasts a few hours or perhaps a few days and is typically very beneficial. But when inflammation doesnâ€™t turn off and lasts for weeks, years or even decades, this can cause significant damage over time.
This harmful type of inflammation can lead to a wide range of age-related health issues â€“ one of the most-common of which is everyday aches and pains in the back and joints.

settings.title: Should I take Durable Body every day or only when Iâ€™m feeling discomfort?
settings.text: Like most nutritional supplements, Durable Body will take time and consistent use to build up in your system in order to achieve maximum effectiveness, so daily usage is highly recommended.

settings.title: How long does it take for Durable Body to work?
settings.text: Based on the clinical studies of PEA, you should start to feel a reduction in discomfort after two weeks of daily usage and feel significantly less discomfort within 30 days.

settings.title: Is Durable Body vegan, non-GMO and gluten-free?
settings.text: Yes, Yes and Yes. While Durable Body is vegan, Non-GMO and gluten free, you should be aware that it is made in a manufacturing facility that does process products that contain gluten and has not been certified as gluten free by the manufacturer for those with severe gluten issues.
